texts.biography: Ajit studied carefully the works of Agar, the foolish wizard/scientist of Enroth who accidentally created the beholders and evil eyes which he now commands, training a 'better breed' to be used in combat.
texts.name: Ajit

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Beholders or Evil Eyes for each level attained after 2nd level.
specialty.name: Beholders
